resources.string: Equip the item on your Hero under the [Item] > [Equipment] menu.
Clear stages and acquire up to 3 Heroes.
Certain stages reward you with a Hero character.
Use Mana to increase the levels of your Heroes.
Heroes consume Mana to use their special skills.
Special skills have a downtime after each use.
Clear a stage to receive Hero Points.
Configure your game settings under the [Title Screen] > Settings.
Basic units can be upgraded up to Level 3.
Hero units can be upgraded up to Level 5.
Upgrade your units to give them stronger abilities.
